definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: The content of ent-kaurane diterpenes was highest in A. squamosa L. (hainan).
sentences.chinese: 贝壳杉烷型二萜成分以海南产圆滑番荔枝中含量最高。

sentences.english: Wide ovals and sleek cat-eye styles work to diminish fullness.
sentences.chinese: 宽椭圆形和圆滑的猫眼款可以起到收敛圆脸的效果。

sentences.english: He acts like a politician in a way that he avoid himself from falling into traps.
sentences.chinese: 猴像外家一样圆滑精明，能避免自己陷入困境。

sentences.english: The front end of the anal tube has a smooth sealed structure.
sentences.chinese: 所述的肛管前端为圆滑的封闭结构。

sentences.english: Converted to smoother lactic acid during malolactic fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 在苹果乳酸发酵期间会转化为更圆滑的乳酸。

sentences.english: Those sophistications forced me to connect things in my life in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 剧中的那些圆滑世故让我联想到现实生活中的事情。

sentences.english: Dual LED taillight design provides excellent visibility and a sleek profile.
sentences.chinese: 双LED尾灯设计提供了良好的知名度和圆滑的轮廓。

sentences.english: The leather surface embossed by this machine is glossy, smooth and of very strong plastic effect.
sentences.chinese: 经该机压印后的花纹皮面光泽圆滑，立体性极强。

sentences.english: Early incarnations of Lando described him as a slick, riverboat gambler type.
sentences.chinese: 兰多早期的形象被描绘成一个圆滑的船上贝者徒类型。

sentences.english: And now the final step of this process is to round the corners of the foreground images.
sentences.chinese: 现在到了本阶段的最后一步，圆滑背景中图像的转角。

sentences.english: In the mouth, it's smooth and citrus fruit driven with some nutty notes.
sentences.chinese: 在口中，她很圆滑，柑橘果主导并带有果仁的风味。

sentences.english: Manipulator bosses are the smoothest of bullies.
sentences.chinese: 控制者是恶霸中最圆滑的。

sentences.english: I loved the mellow sound of the firm bow drawn across the strings.
sentences.chinese: 我喜爱稳稳的弓拉过弦的那种圆滑的声音。

sentences.english: The 3D data are processed smoothly with the help of bicubic spline interpolation.
sentences.chinese: 采用双三次样条插值对三维数据体进行圆滑处理。

sentences.english: Smoothness, elegance and finesse of tannic structure characterize our wines.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒的特色是圆滑，高雅和丹宁结构细腻。

definition: be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
(of a shape) sharp and clearcut/(of a person) definite in his opinion
(fig.) adaptable/able to deal with various kinds of people and situations/(derog.) insincere/two-faced
pinyin: jian4 ren2 shuo1 ren2 hua4 , jian4 gui3 shuo1 gui3 hua4
related.word: 见人说人话，见鬼说鬼话

definition: worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
